name: PopViewers
description: Popviewers is a technology startup that aims to amplify diverse entertainment audiences. They are democratizing the TV and movie review process and plan to soon become a sentiment analytics and marketing resource for theater chains, studios, networks...
one_liner: Popviewers is a technology startup that aims to amplify diverse entertainment audiences. They are democratizing the TV and movie review process and plan to soon become a sentiment analytics and marketing resource for theater chains, studios, networks...
location: New York City, New York, United States
